RuleSet.Name: src/schemaobj/SchemaSchemaObj.java

GenFile.Name: fileSchemaSchemaObjJava
GenFile.BasePackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$/src/main/java
GenFile.SubPackageName: $reference ManufacturingSchema lower JavaPackage$.$reference ManufacturingSchema lower SchemaName$obj

RuleSet.GenRule: public static String SCHEMA_NAME = "$SchemaName$"; public static String SCHEMA_DBNAME = "$lower DbSchemaName$";
$iterate SchemaRefs( each ApplyJavaSchemaObjImplementation empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema JavaSchemaObjImplementation$
$iterate SchemaRefs( each ApplyJavaSchemaObjMembers empty empty )$
$reference RefSchema JavaSchemaObjMembers$
$implSchemaSchemaObjGetSetDbSchemaNameGetMethods$$implSchemaSchemaObjGetSetDbSchemaNameSetMethods$
protected I$SchemaName$$TableName$TableObj $leadlower TableName$TableObj;
$leadlower TableName$TableObj = new $SchemaName$$TableName$TableObj( this );
